oracle.jbo.jbotester.dialog
Class JTDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      oracle.jbo.jbotester.dialog.JTDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericDialog, OutputDialog, VCDialog
public abstract class JTDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

JTDialog is the base class for all dialogs in the jbotester package. It adds basic functionality to the swing JDialog, such as Help and keyboard actions.

See Also:
Serialized Form

cancel

protected void cancel()
This method is executed when the user presses the Cancel button, or the ESC key. It will execute the cancel action for the dialog, and close the dialog.

save

protected void save()
This method is executed when the user presses the OK button, or the ENTER key. It will execute the save action for the dialog, and close the dialog.

doHelp

protected void doHelp()
This method is executed when the user presses the help button, or the F1 key. It will present the help window for the current dialog.
